Text:
378 seeders and still no comment about the A / V quality, the audio (English / Italian)?
Torrent was not supposed to be like this, it was all about sharing, and make sure they meant comments too!

LOL, hate to break it to you buddy, but torrent is actually about stealing and the types of people that pirate movies aren't really the types to leave a/v quality notes back at the site after watching. Some do, but most are out for a cheap flick fix.
